#summary Details on closeItemPriority() API function
#sidebar ApiFunctions

Call this function if you need to close *immediately* an item on Delcampe website.<br>
This close method must *only* be used to close an item sold on another website.<br>
However, you cannot close a Delcampe auction item with a bid on it.<br>

A delay of 5 seconds is applied between two calls of this function.


=== Call ===

 * syntax : closeItemPriority(string token, integer idItem)

 * parameter 1 : _string_  : secret token
 * parameter 2 : _integer_ : id of the item you want to close

=== Response ===

 * response : _array_ : the immediate response is always an array of 2 elements
  * element 1 : _boolean_ : true (if call ok) or false (if call not ok)
  * element 2 : _string_  : message, giving you more information on the function call result 

 * example : 
  * if call of the function is ok, the return will always be like this :
   * array(true, 'Your item has been closed!')
  * if call of the function is not ok, the message will differ :
   * array(false, 'You are not the owner of this item!')
   * array(false, 'This item is already sold!')
   * array(false, 'There is already a bid on this item!')

=== Notification ===
 * None

=== Code example (PHP) ===
{{{
//FUNCTION CALL
$objSoapClient = new SoapClient('http://api.delcampe.net/soap.php?wsdl');
list($success, $token) = $objSoapClient->authenticateUser('MyPersonalApiKey');

if (true === $success) {
  $return = $objSoapClient->closeItemPriority($token, 96485615);
  if ($return[0] === true) {
    var_export($return[1], 1);
  } else {
    echo 'Function call failed. Error message : ' . $return[1]; 
  }
}
}}}
